text: Wuppertal is a city in the west of Germany, in the state of North Rhine- Westphalia. It is next to DÃ¼sseldorf. Wuppertal has about 360,000 inhabitants. It has a university. A well-known tourist attraction is the Wuppertal Schwebebahn, a tram hanging about above ground. ==References== ==Other websites==
title: Wuppertal
